price: бољим од њих да их заменимо и нико у томе не може да Нас спречи.
arabic: عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّبَدِّلَ خَيۡرٗا مِّنۡهُمۡ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَسۡبُوقِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ʿalā an nubaddila khayran min'hum wamā naḥnu bimasbūqīna
